00006 class patched_object {
00007         
00027         function patched_object() 
00028         {
00029                 //trigger_error("qcl_jsonrpc_object constructor called");
00030                 $args = func_get_args();
00031                 if (method_exists($this, '__destruct')) 
00032                 {
00033                         register_shutdown_function (array(&$this, '__destruct'));
00034                 }
00035                 if (method_exists($this, '__construct')) 
00036                 {
00037                         call_user_func_array(array(&$this, '__construct'), $args);
00038                 }
00039         }
00040 
00041     function __construct() {}
00042 
00043 }
00044 
00045 // basis of all jsonrpc service classes
00046 
00047 class qcl_jsonrpc_object extends patched_object {
00048 
00052         var $error;
00053 
00059         var $service_dir;
00060         
00064         var $result = array();
00065         
00069         function __construct() 
00070         {
00071                 parent::__construct();
00072                 $this->configureService();
00073         }
00074 
00078         function &setSingleton( $instance ) 
00079         {
00080         global $qcl_jsonrpc_singletons;
00081         $classname = get_class ( $instance );
00082         $qcl_jsonrpc_singletons[$classname] = &$instance;
00083         return $instance;
00084     }
00085         
00086         
00090         function &getSingleton( $classname ) 
00091         {
00092         
00093         global $qcl_jsonrpc_singletons;
00094         $instance = &$qcl_jsonrpc_singletons[$classname];
00095         if ( ! is_object ($instance) ) 
00096         {
00097             $instance = new $classname;
00098         }
00099         return $instance;
00100     }
00101         
00110         function configureService()
00111         {
00112                 global $serviceComponents;
00113                 $currPath = servicePathPrefix;
00114                 $this->config = array();
00115                 
00116                 // traverse service path and look for service.ini.php files 
00117                 // 
00118                 for ( $i=0; $i<count($serviceComponents); $i++ )
00119                 {
00120                          $currPath .= $serviceComponents[$i] . "/";
00121                          
00122                          // if config file exists, parse it and add/override config directives
00123                          if ( file_exists ($currPath . "/service.ini.php") )
00124                          {
00125                                 $config = parse_ini_file ( $currPath . "/service.ini.php", true);
00126                                 $this->config = array_merge ( $this->config, $config );
00127                          }
00128                 } 
00129         }
00130 
00136         function set ( $first, $value=null )
00137         {
00138                 if ( is_array( $first ) )
00139                 {
00140                         foreach( $first as $key => $value )
00141                         {
00142                                 $this->set ( $key, $value );
00143                         }
00144                 }
00145                 else
00146                 {
00147                         $this->result[$first] = $value;
00148                 }
00149         }
00150         
00151         
00156         function &get ( $key )
00157         {
00158                 return $this->result[$key];
00159         }
00160         
00164         function &getResult ( $key )
00165         {
00166                 return $this->result;
00167         }
00168         
00174         function addMessage ( $message, $data=true )
00175         {
00176                 if ( is_string ($message) )
00177                 {
00178                         $msg = array();
00179                         $msg[$message]= $data;
00180                 }
00181                 elseif( is_array($message) )
00182                 {
00183                         $msg = $message;
00184                 }
00185                 else
00186                 {
00187                         trigger_error ("Invalid parameter");
00188                 }
00189                 
00190                 $this->set("__messages", array_merge ( $this->get("__messages"), $msg ) );
00191         }
00192         
00196         function getServiceDirUrl($append="")
00197         {
00198                 global $serviceComponents;
00199                 $serverDirUrl = "http://" . getenv (HTTP_HOST) . dirname ( $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ) . "/";
00200                 return $serverDirUrl . $serviceComponents[0] . "/" . $append;
00201         }
00202         
00206         function raiseError( $message, $number=null, $file=null, $line=null )
00207         {
00208                 global $error;
00209                 if ( $file and $line )
00210                 {
00211                         $message .= " in $file, line $line.";
00212                 }
00213                 $error->setError( $number, stripslashes( $message ) );
00214                 $error->SendAndExit();
00215         }
00216         
00221         function debug($var,$html=false)
00222         {
00223                 if ( ! $html )
00224                 {
00225                         // we are in a jsonrpc request, send debug output as error message
00226                         trigger_error( print_r ( $var, true ) );
00227                 }
00228                 else
00229                 {
00230                         // we can happily output as a html response
00231                         echo "<pre>" . htmlentities(var_export( $var, true )) . "</pre>";       
00232                 }
00233         }
00234 }
